game.title: NodeCore ALPHA

long_description:
######An implementation of Go for Nodecore, allowing you to build beautiful boards, good-looking stones, and even territory-marker tokens to help with scoring!

#####Features:
* 4 new concrete tiles for building gobans
* detecting and removing captured groups, with special fx if on a proper board!
* preventing suicide moves
* enforcing ko rule
* pick up connected groups with sneak/aux1
* marker tokens flood-fill in properly surrounded territory, for easy counting and scoring
* 3+ player support!
* last-played-move smoke effect
name: lc_liberties
short_description: A minimalistic approach to enabling the game of go in nodecore.
title: Liberties
